You will only be able to activate it with your recovery phrase!

recovery_phrase.label: Recovery Phrase
recovery_phrase.welcome_msg: Its Ultrices neque consequat dolor diam. Mattis vestibulum dictum in ullamcorper vel venenatis vitae auctor suscipit.
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_error: Unable to update the profile wallet address!
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s1: Crypto-wallets are not like your usual App. They are decentralized which means that only you can control your account!
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s2:
Since only you control your account the developers of this app can’t help you recovering your wallet if you loose or break your phone.

But there is a solution!
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s3: For you to be able to recover this wallet again we have prepared 12 words unique to you, with which you can identify yourself and will be able to access your wallet again.
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s4:
We are about to show you these 12 words.These words need to be written carefully and in the precise order they are shown.

Grab a piece of paper and a pen,write them down and store this piece of paper in a save place. Its your only way of recovering a lost wallet!
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s7: Since we really don’t want you to loose your funds we will quickly check, if you wrote down your phrase correctly.
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s5: Write all words down in the order they are shown.
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s6: Write all words down in the order they are shown.
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s8: Scroll through the words and tap on the word corresponding to the empty, highlighted space.
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s9: Scroll through the words and tap on the word corresponding to the empty, highlighted space.
recovery_phrase.new_wallet_s10: Great! You are all set now, have much fun with your wallet!
recovery_phrase.phrase_error: Your Inputs weren’t correct, please tap to try again!
recovery_phrase.import_wallet_s1:
To import your wallet you have to fill in your recovery phrase, the words you had to write down while creating the wallet.

In the next pages you will have to fill in the words in the correct order!
recovery_phrase.import_wallet_s2: Please fill in the words of your recovery phrase in the correct order!
recovery_phrase.import_wallet_s3: Please fill in the words of your recovery phrase in the correct order!
recovery_phrase.import_wallet_s4: Great! Everything worked and your wallet is being created right now. As soon as its ready you will be forwarded to your wallet.
